About Us

Comprehensive Care for Every Patient's Needs

Since 25 years Nirmala Hospital has been providing quality health care for the people in all their diverse needs. People trust us because of the strong relationships we have built with them over the years. Nirmala Hospital has become a centre of excellence majorly for obstetric gynaecology, orthopaedics and other specialities including general medicine, general surgery, and paediatrics.

Nirmala Hospital has been providing world-class health services at affordable cost. There is never a dull moment at Nirmal Hospital. Each day the hospital receives many walk-ins and emergency cases and in-patients. When it comes to patient care we score a perfect 10. We bring in uncompromised standards in patient care and diagnosis

  • Expert medical professionals dedicated to your health
  • Comprehensive Gynecology and Orthopedics services
  • Advanced fertility treatments and high-risk pregnancy care
  • All orthopedic treatments, including joint replacements and spine surgery

What Our Happy Patients Say!
